App¶

strompris fastapi app entrypoint

app.home(request: Request, location_codes: dict = {'NO1': 'Oslo', 'NO2': 'Kristiansand', 'NO3': 'Trondheim', 'NO4': 'Tromsø', 'NO5': 'Bergen'}, today: Optional[date] = datetime.date(2023, 11, 27), days: Optional[int] = 7)¶

Render the home page.

Parameters:

request (-) – The FastAPI Request object.

Returns:

The rendered home.html template with the provided data.

Return type:

  • templates.TemplateResponse

async app.get_plot_prices(locations: Optional[List[str]] = Query(['NO1', 'NO2', 'NO3', 'NO4', 'NO5']), end: Optional[date] = None, days: Optional[int] = 7)¶

Get the vega-lite JSON chart for electricity prices.

Parameters:

  • locations (-) – A list of location codes for which to

  • locations. (fetch prices. Defaults to all) –

  • end (-) – The end date for fetching prices.

  • date. (Defaults to the current) –

  • days (-) – The number of days to fetch prices for.

  • 7. (Defaults to) –

Returns:

A dictionary containing the vega-lite JSON chart for electricity prices.

Return type:

  • dict

async app.get_activity(request: Request, location_codes: dict = {'NO1': 'Oslo', 'NO2': 'Kristiansand', 'NO3': 'Trondheim', 'NO4': 'Tromsø', 'NO5': 'Bergen'}, activities: dict = {'baking': 2.5, 'heat': 1, 'shower': 30}, today: date = datetime.date(2023, 11, 27))¶

Get the activity template.

Parameters:

  • request (-) – The FastAPI request object.

  • location_codes (-) – Dictionary mapping location codes to names.

  • activities (-) – Dictionary mapping activity names to energy values.

  • today (-) – The current date. Defaults to the current date.

Returns:

The FastAPI template response for the activity template.

Return type:

  • templates.TemplateResponse

async app.get_plot_activity(location: Optional[str] = 'NO1', activity: Optional[str] = 'shower', minutes: Optional[int] = 10, today: Optional[date] = None)¶

Get the JSON chart for the specified activity.

Parameters:

  • location (-) – The location code. Defaults to “NO1”.

  • activity (-) – The activity name. Defaults to “shower”.

  • minutes (-) – The duration of the activity in minutes. Defaults to 10.

  • today (-) – The current date. Defaults to None.

Returns:

The JSON chart representing the specified activity.

Return type:

  • dict

app.main()¶

Launches the application on port 5000 with uvicorn
